channel.title: Wisconsin Sports (Core Teams)
channel.description: Packers, Bucks, Brewers scores + UW Badgers scores & news.

item.title: Brewers News: Brewers add bullpen depth by acquiring Zerpa from Royals (source)
UW News • Volleyball: Feeling Elite: Badgers battle in Regional Finals for eighth-straight season
item.description: AUSTIN, Texas - For the eighth consecutive season, the No. 3 Wisconsin volleyball team will compete in the Regional Final, this time against No. 1 Texas from the Lone Star State on Sunday, Dec. 14. First serve is set for 6:30 p.m. CT at Gregory Gymnasium and the match will be televised on ESPN.

item.title: NCAAW • Final: Green Bay Phoenix 74 @ Washington Huskies 79 (Final)
item.description: Green Bay Phoenix vs Washington Huskies — Final

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: No. 3 Badgers stump Cardinal, advance to Regional Finals
item.description: AUSTIN, Texas - The No. 3 Wisconsin volleyball team defeated No. 2 Stanford (25-17, 21-25, 25-23, 25-22) behind another prolific performance on the offensive end—hitting .420 (70 - 15 - 131)  by the conclusion of the four-set match.

item.title: NCAAWV • Final: Wisconsin Badgers 3 @ Stanford Cardinal 1 (Final)
item.description: Wisconsin Badgers vs Stanford Cardinal — Final

item.title: UW News • Men's Basketball: Badgers to host pair of Greg Gard Shows live at Buck and Honey’s
item.description: MADISON, Wis. – Fans are welcome to join the Badgers at Buck and Honey's as UW will host a pair of Greg Gard Shows at their establishments.

item.description: The Wisconsin men's basketball team fell 90-60 to No. 23 Nebraska on Wednesday night at Pinnacle Bank Arena.

item.description: The Big Ten Conference announced its 2025-26 Fall Academic All-Big Ten teams this Wednesday, with a tremendous 91 student-athletes at the University of Wisconsin-Madison achieving the honor.

item.description: The Big Ten Conference announced its 2025-26 Fall Academic All-Big Ten teams this Wednesday, with a tremendous 91 student-athletes at the University of Wisconsin-Madison achieving the honor.

item.title: UW News • Women's Basketball: Badgers outpace San Diego, 74-46
item.description: Thanks to 42 points off the bench, the Wisconsin women's basketball team beat San Diego 75-46 on Wednesday at the Kohl Center.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: How Sweet It Is: No. 3 Badgers take on NCAA Regionals
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The No. 3 Wisconsin volleyball team will look to continue their NCAA Tournament run, as they are set to take on No. 2 Stanford in Austin, Texas, on Friday, Dec. 12 at Gregory Gymnasium. The match will begin 30 minutes after the conclusion of the first regional semifinal between No. 4 Indiana and No. 1 Texas, slated to start at 11:00 a.m. CT. Both matches will be televised on ESPN.

UW News • Volleyball: Badgers Land Five on AVCA North All-Region Team
item.description: MADISON, Wis. – Five total players of the Wisconsin volleyball team were named to the American Volleyball Coaches Association (AVCA) North All-Region Team. Outside hitter Mimi Colyer was named North Player of the Year, while head coach Kelly Sheffield was named Coach of the Year.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Saddle Up: No. 3 Badgers advance to Regional Semifinals
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The No. 3 Wisconsin volleyball team punched their ticket to the Regional Semifinals for the 13th consecutive season with their second sweep in as many days, this time defeating North Carolina (25-14, 25-21, 27-25) in the Second Round of the NCAA Tournament.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: No. 3 Badgers stifle Panthers to kick off postseason action
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The No. 3 Wisconsin women's volleyball team dominated in the First Round of the NCAA Tournament, sweeping Eastern Illinois (25-11, 25-6, 25-19) behind another strong performance on the offensive end.

item.description: The Wisconsin men's basketball team renews one of college basketball's most storied rivalries, facing Marquette for the 132nd on Saturday. Tipoff at the Kohl Center is set for 1 p.m. CT.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: No. 3 Badgers begin playoff journey
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - The No. 3 Wisconsin volleyball team begins their quest to Kansas City and an NCAA Championship this week, as they will take on Eastern Illinois on Thursday, Dec. 4 at the UW Field House in the First Round of the NCAA Tournament.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Volleyball All-B1G Honors Announced
item.description: MADISON, Wis. – Carter Booth, Mimi Colyer and Charlie Fuerbringer of the Wisconsin volleyball team have been named to the 2025 All-Big Ten First Team, while freshman Kristen Simon earned All-Freshman honors, announced by the conference Tuesday afternoon.

item.title: UW News • Volleyball: Colyer tallies fifth weekly conference award
item.description: MADISON, Wis. - For the fifth time this season, outside hitter Mimi Colyer of the Wisconsin volleyball team has been awarded the Big Ten Player of the Week after another pair of strong performances to close out the regular season.
